data.title: Great food!
data.text: My husband and I ran across this place by luck on a visit to Scottsdale. The food was fabulous and fresh. The staff was friendly. We would love to eat here again if ever in the area in the future.

data.title: Nice!
data.text:
Great choices, and great service.  Although this is a national brand (I believe with over 50 locations nationwide), it has a local feel.  They serve great food but also smoothies.

Their advertisement claims "healthy shakes", and they're made as smoothies.  The smoothies were good and I enjoyed mine, but I wouldn't say they were "great".  Mainly they were a little "chalky" in texture, which is likely from the powder used to make them.  If you're looking for a sweet dessert, I would recommend something else.  But if you want a more healthy selection, they are good.  I would recommend anything with Lemon.

data.title: Really Really good food
data.text: Lots of choices and everything was very fresh and DeelisH . The Chicken, Turkey and Beef are cooked onsite.

data.title: Decent Philly Cheese Steak
data.text: First we tried the place next door (the Gyro place) but were roundly ignored so we stumbled on this place by accident and were pleasantly surprised. My wife had the half sandwich and half salad and was delighted with both: the "Bobby" was a turkey, cranberry and stuffing affair which she said was great. My Philly Cheese Steak was everything I expected so we'd do another lunch here no problem.

data.title: Great sandwiches!
data.text: A recommendation from a friend whose been eating at Capriottis for a long time.  He recommended the bobbie.  It's basically thanksgiving in a sandwich.  It's amazing.  I loved it. I'm definitely going to come back to try other sandwiches.  They all sounded and looked good.

data.title: Always a pleasure
data.text: Nice atmosphere - a little East coast without being obnoxious. Great sandwiches and location.... Highly recommend "The Bobbi" sandwich

data.title: It's not PA but it is the greatest Philly Cheese Steak sandwich I have found in AZ
data.text: For several years I have eaten their cheese steak sandwich , able to try just one other sandwich in all this time because I couldn't pass up that marvelous beef, onion, mushroom and cheese sandwich!  Abundant quantities of beef cooked with mushrooms and fried onions and provolone cheese.  For a dollar extra I have them put 4 extra slices of cheese on my 12 inch sandwich.  It melts beautifully!  I also get chopped hot red peppers on the side.  There is a choice of 9 inch, 12 inch and 20 inch long subs.  My wife and I split a 12 incher 60/40!!!  There is usually at least 3 kinds of high quality fresh brewed tea or the usual fountain drinks. They bake their own sub rolls and I wish I could get them to make my own sandwiches at home.  This will remain my go to place for a long time to come!

data.title: So good!
data.text: Everything was amazing! I am so glad I stumbled upon this place. They have pulled turkey with cole slaw, and it is incredible! The soups are homemade and delicious as well!

data.title: Great food and service!
data.text: We ate here for a quick lunch by reccomendation of our hotel. Great food and excellent service. We ate the tuna and turkey sandwhiches. Great for a quick bite!

data.title: Yummy food...
data.text: The sandwiches  at this restaurant were very good. My husband had the chicken philly cheesteak with veggies and enjoyed it. I chose to do the half sandwich, half soup deal. I ordered half of the Bobbie which was delicious. It's like Thanksgiving in a sandwich. I would have given them a rating of 5, however my soup was cold when I received it. I asked for them to heat it and then patiently waited for them to let me know it was ready. After about 20 minutes my husband was ready to leave and I quite frankly didn't want the soup anymore. As we were leaving one of the people working, said something along the lines of, oh yes here is your soup. I was a little annoyed that it seemed like they had forgotten about half of my meal. They gave me the soup to go, and we left. Again, if it wasn't for the cold soup, they would have earned a 5 from me!

data.title: Good place to grab a quick sandwich
data.text: This was a quick, but super tasty stop on our way to the airport.  Great sandwiches...some of our crew got hot sandwiches, some cold...all were great!

data.title: The salads are a good value.
data.text:
I've gotten some great salads from here. Although, I wasn't too impressed with the sandwiches..I do not understand how they've gotten so many awards. It's barely above jimmy john's in my opinion.

Although, the staff members are excellent!

If you want to get a good sanwhich go to defalco's.

data.title: You Have Got to Try The "Bobbie"
data.text: Visited Scottsdale today and saw their sign indicating they were one of the best sandwich shops in America. We ordered a 12" "Bobbie" and it was more than enough food for the both of us. The "Bobbie" is basically a hoagie made with turkey, cranberry sauce, mayonnaise and stuffing. They offer several types of sandwiches, sodas and fountain drinks and several varieties of smoothies. If you are ever in Old Town Scottsdale you should visit Capriottis.

data.title: Advanced Fast Food from an Old School Place
data.text:
The owner took our order and the food arrived almost before we could fill our drinks.

Delicious sandwiches, really good turkey chili. The sandwiches have well thought out ingredients, great rolls and are large enough for two people. 

It's quick, tastes good and well located in old Scottsdale.

data.title: A Happy Surprise!!
data.text: I was in Downtown Scottsdale today with my Niece and Great Nephew ( 6 months old), and after shopping, we stopped for lunch at Capriotti's Sandwich Shop.  What an amazing surprise to have a sandwich there.  My niece had their Homemade Meatball Sub and I ordered the Capastrami, with Hot pastrami, Swiss cheese, Russian Dressing, and cole slaw.  My niece loved her sandwich and I am originally from New York and I have had some great Pastrami sandwiches before and I have to say, this was incredible. First we ordered the small, and that small was huge. The price was great and the service was just as good.. This is on my "have to eat places" when in Scottsdale, AZ.  Thank you to the owners, staff and cooks and I can't wait to come back again!!  :)

data.title: Fantastic quick bite to eat
data.text: We were out walking and decided to have a drink and tuna sandwich. It was very tasty, came right out and wasn't expensive. Cant go wrong here!!

data.title: Excellent sandwiches
data.text: Ordered a tray of sandwiches before the National Championship game and they did a great job.  Sandwiches were enjoyed by all of our folks at the tailgate (got lots of compliments) and they also packed up a bag of plates and condiments and utensils for us.  Everything you could ask for in a sandwich shop and prepared it all for us in 20 minutes. So we gave them little notice and they exceeded our expectations.  Thank you!

data.title: Great sandwich
data.text: I took my family for lunch here, we all left full and happy. Not fancy, but good food, fast and cheap.

data.title: In the heart of Old Town
data.text: You can't go wrong if you're looking for a delicious quick inexpensive meal. Roast turkey cooked daily was unbelievable as was the roast beef sandwich. Too many mouth watering choices. Would definitely return.

data.title: Good place for a quick lunch
data.text: Went there for lunch and had a Bobbie sandwich. it was a sandwich with Turkey and cranberry jam. They called it Thanksgiving in a sandwich and the combination was really good in my opinion.
